## LoginSuccessActionPayload interface

Represents the action payload when a successful login attempt has been made

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface LoginSuccessActionPayload 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [previousUser?](./state-auth.loginsuccessactionpayload.previoususer.md) | [CurrentUser](./state-auth.currentuser.md) | <i>(Optional)</i> The previous user that was active in the system |
|  [response](./state-auth.loginsuccessactionpayload.response.md) | [LoginResponse](./state-auth.loginresponse.md) | The response from the external api |
|  [returnUrl?](./state-auth.loginsuccessactionpayload.returnurl.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> A router url used to redirect the user after login |
